segments.text: Did you see the picture of the guy on the front page of the newspaper this morning ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . I haven't had a chance to read the paper yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you've got to see it . It's an unbelievable picture !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , this guy fell asleep on the sofa and when he woke up , half his face had been bitten off !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They think his dog was trying to wake him up and couldn't , so ended up biting him in his face .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow . What does his look like now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It looks pretty frightening . He doesn't have any lips , so all you can see are his gums and teeth . Most of his nose and chin are missing too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What did he look like before his dog bit his face off ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He was actually quite handsome . What a shame .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's he going to do now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It said that he's hoping to get a face transplant , but until then , he's looking forward to Halloween so he isn't the only one wearing a mask .
segments.speaker: S1
